titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that welfare programs discourage marriage and hurt the institution of the family in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense that welfare programs discourage marriage and hurt the institution of the family. It also supports action to review and change governmental programs, tax credits, or policies that financially penalize married couples as opposed to unmarried individuals.
